channel.title: Weather and Random Events
channel.description:
Warning: This thread is very image heavy. If you have a slow internet connection, I have provided a text summary of the features. Also check out the development website at http://www.rsresources.net/. We have another very interesting project going on that you'll have to go there to see.
AScape is currently 2.5848574874984968749123% done.
Features:
[ul][li]1. A WeatherManager. [list] [li]Snow[/li] [li]Day[/li] [li]Afternoon[/li] [li]Evening[/li] [li]Night[/li] [li]Lanterns and candles brighten the night[/li] [li]Gusts of wind occasionally extinguish candles[/li] [/list] [/li] [li]2. Random Events [list] [li]Items falling from the sky[/li] [li]The GenderBender[/li] [li]Godsends[/li] [li]Calamities[/li] [/list] [/li][/ul]
And here we get to the meat of the topic. The weather is done for now, there's nothing else I see fit to add. Some demo pics.
Daytime [img]http://img220.imageshack.us/img220/213/screenshot19br2.png[/img]
Afternoon [img]http://img186.imageshack.us/img186/8016/screenshot20ii2.png[/img]
Evening [img]http://img139.imageshack.us/img139/9651/screenshot21ar1.png[/img]
Night [img]http://img186.imageshack.us/img186/751/screenshot22yk6.png[/img]
Snow [img]http://img151.imageshack.us/img151/8445/screenshot23jm1.png[/img]
And here we get to the special cases. In the night, it's hard to see, so I added lanterns and candles to brighten up the world. Lanterns are brighter than candles, and candles may blow out.
This is a build on the first WeatherManager. I added support for candles and lantern to brighten up the night, but I made it so that candles can randomly be blown out by the wind.
A candle in the night [img]http://img183.imageshack.us/img183/281/screenshot25fy4.png[/img]
A gust of wind [img]http://img166.imageshack.us/img166/9589/screenshot26qz7.png[/img]
A lantern in the night [img]http://img156.imageshack.us/img156/3743/screenshot27yz9.png[/img]
A candle, but a backup lantern. [img]http://img403.imageshack.us/img403/8797/screenshot28ov4.png[/img]
And now, further again, we get to the randoms. I put some basic random events into place, either original or modeled after things from another game. I have specified where the idea came from in the description if it's not original.
1. Skyfall - random items fall from the sky into a random person's inventory. 2. The GenderBender - character's appearances are randomized. 3. Godsends - based on IRPG, a player is blessed by the gods at a random skill. Translation: increased xp. 4. Calamities - based on IRPG, a player loses experience in a random skill.
Some pictures, because I know you love pictures.
GenderBender I [img]http://img77.imageshack.us/img77/513/screenshot32dv1.png[/img]
Skyfall [img]http://img77.imageshack.us/img77/3508/screenshot29vu1.png[/img]
Godsend [img]http://img77.imageshack.us/img77/5895/screenshot30id7.png[/img]
Calamity [img]http://img77.imageshack.us/img77/3039/screenshot31yn9.png[/img]
Followed by some more interesting pictures of the GenderBender. [img]http://img77.imageshack.us/img77/3408/screenshot15kp3.png[/img] [img]http://img77.imageshack.us/img77/3188/screenshot16xt4.png[/img] [img]http://img77.imageshack.us/img77/4238/screenshot17qc3.png[/img] [img]http://img77.imageshack.us/img77/1337/screenshot18qf2.png[/img]
I'm planning future additions to the random events, such as the genie lamps like in RS2. I also have an experimental subplot going on with a war in Falador, and I'll post pictures when I get a chance.
Finally, I'd also like to thank the people who went on the server and gave comments. Thank you, uber killer, Version, and Tree. I'd also like to thank Tree for his help in the Falador planning.
Future ideas are welcome.
Enjoy. Post comments either here or at http://www.rsresources.net/.

blitz_9100:

is it everywher in your server.maybe you should make fatiuge to skills and day and night(i heard acouple of tutorials on fatiuge and sitting down thats supposed to come out)then your server will be the most realistic. i would love to play on your server.

Yes, it’s everywhere. I have fatigue in the way where your run energy drops as the day goes on, and increases when it snows or becomes day. The server’s ascape.bounceme.net on port 43595, but I don’t usually keep it up. The site’s always up, though. http://www.rsresources.net/. I might add chocolate bars to increase energy

Mrquarter:

Very nice dude.

Thanks.

I’m going to add color-randomizing to the GenderBender sometime.
